hasMessage.hasTextContent: Velpatasvir   with sofosbuvir   slightly   increases   the exposure to   atorvastatin .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Venetoclax is predicted to increase the exposure to atorvastatin. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Venetoclax   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   atorvastatin .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Verapamil is predicted to slightly to moderately increase the exposure to atorvastatin. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Verapamil   is predicted to   slightly to moderately   increase   the exposure to   atorvastatin .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both atorvastatin and vincristine can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  atorvastatin  and  vincristine  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to atorvastatin. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose and monitor rhabdomyolysis.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   atorvastatin .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose and monitor rhabdomyolysis .

hasDitaContent.@value: Voxilaprevir with sofosbuvir and velpatasvir is predicted to increase the exposure to atorvastatin. Manufacturer advises adjust atorvastatin dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voxilaprevir   with sofosbuvir and velpatasvir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   atorvastatin .  Manufacturer advises adjust  atorvastatin  dose .
